sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { SubmitHandler } from "react-hook-form/dist/types" export const AddTrainForm=()=>{ interface TrainForm{ sorozat: number becenev: string gyarto: string maxSebesseg: number } const {register,formState: {errors},handleSubmit,reset} = useForm({mode: 'onTouched'}) const onSubmit: SubmitHandler = (data: {sorozat:string,becenev:string,gyarto:string,maxSebesseg:number})=>{ axios.post("http://localhost:8080/trains/train",{sorozat: data.sorozat,becenev: data.becenev, gyarto: data.gyarto, maxSebesseg: data.maxSebesseg}) .then(function (response:any){ reset() }) .catch(function (error:any){ alert(error.message) }) } return(
{errors.sorozat?.message}
{errors.becenev?.message}
{errors.gyarto?.message}
{errors.maxSebesseg?.message}
) }
